definition: grateful and seeking to repay the kindness (idiom)
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Gratitude and greed go not together.
sentences.chinese: 貪婪者絕不會有感恩圖報之心。
